layman_description: Solid slugs for shotguns that punch through individual targets.
technical_description: Shotgun ammunition variant using single large projectile instead of pellet spread.
player_impact: When you use slugs, each shot hits harder against a single zombie instead of spreading damage.

layman_description: A player-built wall safe without security measures for base storage.
technical_description: Wall-mounted loot container with player placement and unsecured state.
player_impact: You can install these safes in your player base to store valuables.

layman_description: Breaching rounds for shotguns designed to destroy locks and doors.
technical_description: Specialized shotgun ammunition with high block damage property for environmental destruction.
player_impact: Fire these at locked doors to break them open without needing tools or keys.

layman_description: A brown player-built gun safe without locks for weapon storage.
technical_description: Weapon storage container variant with brown finish and player placement mechanics.
player_impact: Decorate your base with brown gun safes while storing your firearms securely inside.

layman_description: Standard rifle rounds for 7.62mm weapons with balanced performance.
technical_description: Rifle ammunition with standard kinetic properties for medium-range engagements.
player_impact: Common ammo for hunting rifles and AK-47s, good for most mid-game combat.

layman_description: A player-placed desk safe in open state for base storage.
technical_description: Desk container with open animation and player placement capability.
player_impact: You can place open safes in your base for convenient item access.

layman_description: Hollow-point rifle rounds for increased zombie damage.
technical_description: High-penetration rifle ammunition with expanded trauma properties.
player_impact: These rounds do more damage to zombies but less against armor.

layman_description: A player-built wall safe with security features.
technical_description: Wall-mounted loot container with player placement and lock mechanism enabled.
player_impact: Place these in multiplayer to keep teammates out of your valuables.

layman_description: Armor-piercing rounds that penetrate protective gear.
technical_description: Anti-armor rifle ammunition with high penetration value for defeating protection.
player_impact: Use these against heavily-armored zombies and player defenses.

layman_description: A player-placed gun safe with locking mechanism for security.
technical_description: Firearm container with player ownership and active lock security state.
player_impact: Lock your gun safe in multiplayer to prevent teammates from taking weapons.

layman_description: Standard 9mm pistol ammunition for basic firearms.
technical_description: Handgun cartridge with standard velocity and reliable projectile mechanics.
player_impact: The most common ammo you find, used in pistols and SMGs.

layman_description: A locked desk safe in open state placed by player.
technical_description: Desk container variant with open state rendering and security lock engaged.
player_impact: You can see it's open but others can't access items if you lock it.

layman_description: Hollow-point 9mm rounds for better zombie stopping power.
technical_description: Handgun ammunition with expanded trauma and increased organism damage.
player_impact: Better against zombies than regular 9mm but fewer rounds in magazines.

layman_description: An open wall safe with lock enabled for protected storage.
technical_description: Wall-mounted container with open state and security lock mechanism.
player_impact: Display items in your safe while keeping them locked away from others.

layman_description: Armor-piercing 9mm rounds for penetrating defenses.
technical_description: Armor-bypass handgun ammunition for defeating protective equipment.
player_impact: Effective against other players with armor and heavily protected zombies.

layman_description: A locked desk safe placed by player for secure base storage.
technical_description: Desk container with lock mechanism engaged and player placement.
player_impact: Store valuables safely in your base with a locked safe.

layman_description: Large-caliber magnum rounds for powerful handguns.
technical_description: Heavy-duty revolver ammunition with high kinetic impact energy.
player_impact: Magnum weapons fire slower but hit very hard with these rounds.

layman_description: A brown player-built gun safe with security lock engaged.
technical_description: Weapon container with brown finish and locked security state.
player_impact: Secure your firearms in a brown safe visible in your base.

layman_description: Expansion magnum rounds with devastating stopping power.
technical_description: High-damage revolver ammunition with trauma expansion mechanics.
player_impact: One of the most damaging handgun rounds against single targets.

layman_description: A large double-wide open wall safe with security locks.
technical_description: Extended wall-mounted container with double-width model and lock state.
player_impact: A larger safe for storing more items while keeping them locked.
